messages.title: It's time to have your say!
messages.content: As your SNP Westminster candidate for the forthcoming General Election, I feel it is important to conduct this survey to find out what issues really matter to you.[...] Please take a few minutes to complete our survey because your views are important to us!

issues.brexitEurope: Do you agree that the Scottish Parliament should hold a referendum to increase its powers as occurs under the independence, giving Scotland equal status to each of the existing 27 European Union member states?
issues.economy: Norway has built up a fund equal to £60,000 per person to enhance its infrastructure and services. Do you agree with the SNP that Scotland should have such a fund?
issues.governance: Do you agree that the UK Labour Government's plans to hold a UK referendum to bring in a new voting system and another in Wales to increase the Welsh Assembly's powers?
issues.socialWelfare: The UK Labour Government intends to abolish Attendance Allowance and remove Disability Living Allowance from people over 65. Do you support this?

images.caption: Resident's survey information card featuring candidate photo and SNP logo

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet appears to be a survey for constituents rather than outlining detailed policies or campaign promises.
